derivation: or מֹרָא; or מוֹרָהxlit môrâh corrected to môwrâh; (Psalm 9:20), from H3372 (יָרֵא);
outline:
1. fear, reverence, terror
    1. fear, terror
    2. reverence
    3. object of reverence
    4. awe-inspiring spectacle or deed
kjv_def: dread, (that ought to be) fear(-ed), terribleness, terror.
strongs_def: fear; by implication, a fearful thing or deed
